attributes.action: Keep the voting age at 18 years.
attributes.additional_details: Most 16/17 year olds are immature to make a decision and should the voting age is to be reduced to 16 it should be done by referendum.
attributes.background: I would like the government to keep the voting age at 18 years old.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Don't lower the voting age to 16
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733604

We call for a referendum before extending voting rights to 16 & 17-year-olds
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733679
